workspaceName.title: Workspace Name
workspaceName.description: The name of workspace application will be installed to.

slackSecret.title: Slack Signed Secret
slackSecret.description: The Slack app's signing secret used for validating requests coming from Slack by verifying its unique signature. You can find it in the app's Basic Information.

image.title: Docker image
image.description: Specify the GitHub Connector image you want to use.
